alert.note: Alert for Grant (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS LaCrosse (Southwestern Wisconsin, Southeastern Minnesota, and Northeast Iowa)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued March 31 at 6:10PM CDT until March 31 at 6:45PM CDT by NWS LaCrosse
info.description: The National Weather Service in La Crosse has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southeastern Grant County in southwestern Wisconsin... * Until 645 PM CDT. * At 609 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Sherrill, or 9 miles north of Dubuque, moving east at 40 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * This severe thunderstorm will be near... Dickeyville around 620 PM CDT. Cuba City around 630 PM CDT. Platteville around 635 PM CDT. Other locations impacted by this severe thunderstorm include Kieler, Lock And Dam 11, Sandy Hook, Potosi, Louisburg, Platteville Airport and Sinsinawa. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 800 PM CDT for southwestern Wisconsin. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
